snippet.title: Especially for High School Teachers
snippet.description:
* Especially for High School Teachers
J. Emory Howell
...and humor in honor of april fools' day this issue contains 22 pages...how to choose which concepts/ideas/skills to teach how to justify which concepts/ideas/skills to leave out how...
Journal: Journal of Chemical Education - J CHEM EDUC , vol. 76, 1999

snippet.title: Wandering Swindlers: Imposture, Style, and the Inquisition's Pedagogy of Fear in Colonial Mexico
snippet.description:
* Wandering Swindlers: Imposture, Style, and the Inquisition's Pedagogy of Fear in Colonial Mexico
Javier Villa-Flores
Journal: Colonial Latin American Review , vol. 17, no. 2, pp. 251-272, 2008
